   97: 
   98: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   99:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
  100: 
  101: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
  102:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
  103: 
  104: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  105: all() -> 
  106:     [{group, consistency_after_restart},
  107:      {group, consistency_after_dump_tables},
  108:      {group, consistency_after_add_replica},
  109:      {group, consistency_after_del_replica},
  110:      {group, consistency_after_move_replica},
  111:      {group, consistency_after_transform_table},
  112:      %% consistency_after_change_table_copy_type,
  113:      {group, consistency_after_restore},
  114:      {group, checkpoint_retainer_consistency},
  115:      {group, backup_consistency}].
  116:

  196:      {backup_consistency, [],

  202:      {interupted_install_fallback, [],

  204:      {interupted_uninstall_fallback, [], [after_delete]},
  205:      {mnesia_down_during_backup_causes_switch, [],
  206:       [cause_switch_before, cause_switch_after]},
  207:      {mnesia_down_during_backup_causes_abort, [],
  208:       [cause_abort_before, cause_abort_after]},
  209:      {schema_transactions_during_backup, [],
  210:       [change_schema_before, change_schema_after]}].
  211: 
  212: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  213:     Config.
  214: 
  215: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  216:     Config.

  218: 
  219: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  220: %
  221: %  stolen from mnesia_tpcb.erl:
  222: 
  223: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  224: %%% Account record, total size must be at least 100 bytes
  225: 
  226: -define(ACCOUNT_FILLER,
  227:         {123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890,
  228:          123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890,
  229:          123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234}).
  230: 
  231: -record(account,
  232:        {
  233:         id           = 0, %% Unique account id
  234:         branch_id    = 0, %% Branch where the account is held
  235:         balance      = 0, %% Account balance
  236:         filler       = ?ACCOUNT_FILLER  %% Gap filler to ensure size >= 100 bytes
  237:        }).
  238: 
  239: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  240: %%% Branch record, total size must be at least 100 bytes
  241: 
  242: -define(BRANCH_FILLER,
  243:         {123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890,
  244:          123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890,
  245:          123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890}).
  246: 
  247: 
  248: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  249: %%% Teller record, total size must be at least 100 bytes
  250: 
  251: -define(TELLER_FILLER,
  252:         {123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890,
  253:          123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890,
  254:          1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678}).
  255: 
  256: 
  257: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  258: %%% History record, total size must be at least 50 bytes
  259: 
  260: -define(HISTORY_FILLER, 1234567890).
  261: 
  262: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  263: -record(tab_config,
  264:         {
  265:          db_nodes = [node()],
  266:          replica_nodes = [node()],
  267:          replica_type = ram_copies,
  268:          use_running_mnesia = false,
  269:          n_branches = 1,
  270:          n_tellers_per_branch = 10, %% Must be 10
  271:          n_accounts_per_branch = 100000, %% Must be 100000
  272:          branch_filler = ?BRANCH_FILLER,
  273:          account_filler = ?ACCOUNT_FILLER,
  274:          teller_filler = ?TELLER_FILLER
  275:         }).
  276: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  277: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  278: %
  279: %  stolen from mnesia_tpcb.erl:
  280: 
  281: list2rec(List, Fields, DefaultTuple) ->
  282:     [Name|Defaults] = tuple_to_list(DefaultTuple),
  283:     List2 = list2rec(List, Fields, Defaults, []),
  284:     list_to_tuple([Name] ++ List2).
  285: 
  286: list2rec(_List, [], [], Acc) ->
  287:     Acc;
  288: list2rec(List, [F|Fields], [D|Defaults], Acc) ->
  289:     {Val, List2} =
  290:         case lists:keysearch(F, 1, List) of
  291:             false ->
  292:                 {D, List};
  293:             {value, {F, NewVal}} ->
  294:                 {NewVal, lists:keydelete(F, 1, List)}
  295:         end,
  296:     list2rec(List2, Fields, Defaults, Acc ++ [Val]).
  297: 
  298: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  299: 
  300: tpcb_config(ReplicaType, _NodeConfig, Nodes, NoDriverNodes) ->
  301:     [{n_branches, 10},
  302:      {n_drivers_per_node, 10},
  303:      {replica_nodes, Nodes},
  304:      {driver_nodes, Nodes -- NoDriverNodes},
  305:      {use_running_mnesia, true},
  306:      {report_interval, infinity},
  307:      {n_accounts_per_branch, 100},
  308:      {replica_type, ReplicaType},
  309:      {reuse_history_id, true}].
  310: 
  311: %% Stolen from mnesia_tpcb:dist
  312: tpcb_config_dist(ReplicaType, _NodeConfig, Nodes, _Config) ->
  313:     [{db_nodes, Nodes},
  314:      {driver_nodes, Nodes},
  315:      {replica_nodes, Nodes},
  316:      {n_drivers_per_node, 10},
  317:      {n_branches, 1},
  318:      {use_running_mnesia, true},
  319:      {n_accounts_per_branch, 10},
  320:      {replica_type, ReplicaType},
  321:      {stop_after, timer:minutes(15)},
  322:      {report_interval, timer:seconds(10)},
  323:      {reuse_history_id, true}].
  324: 
  325: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  326: %
  327: %  stolen from mnesia_recovery_test.erl:
  328: 
  329: receive_messages([]) -> [];
  330: receive_messages(ListOfMsgs) ->
  331:     receive 
  332:         {Pid, Msg} ->     
  333:             case lists:member(Msg, ListOfMsgs) of
  334:                 false -> 
  335:                     ?warning("I (~p) have received unexpected msg~n ~p ~n",
  336:                         [self(),{Pid, Msg}]),
  337:                     receive_messages(ListOfMsgs);
  338:                 true -> 
  339:                     ?verbose("I (~p) got msg ~p from ~p ~n", [self(),Msg, Pid]),
  340:                     [{Pid, Msg} | receive_messages(ListOfMsgs -- [Msg])]
  341:             end;
  342:         Else -> ?warning("Received unexpected Msg~n ~p ~n", [Else])
  343:     after timer:minutes(3) -> 
  344:             ?error("Timeout in receive msgs while waiting for ~p~n", 
  345:                    [ListOfMsgs])
  346:     end.  
  347: 
  348: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  349: 
  350: consistency_after_restart_1_ram(suite) -> [];
  351: consistency_after_restart_1_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  352:     consistency_after_restart(ram_copies, 2, Config).
  353: 
  354: consistency_after_restart_1_disc(suite) -> [];
  355: consistency_after_restart_1_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  356:     consistency_after_restart(disc_copies, 2, Config).
  357: 
  358: consistency_after_restart_1_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  359: consistency_after_restart_1_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  360:     consistency_after_restart(disc_only_copies, 2, Config).
  361: 
  362: consistency_after_restart_2_ram(suite) -> [];
  363: consistency_after_restart_2_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  364:     consistency_after_restart(ram_copies, 3, Config).
  365: 
  366: consistency_after_restart_2_disc(suite) -> [];
  367: consistency_after_restart_2_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  368:     consistency_after_restart(disc_copies, 3, Config).
  369: 
  370: consistency_after_restart_2_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  371: consistency_after_restart_2_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  372:     consistency_after_restart(disc_only_copies, 3, Config).
  373: 
  374: consistency_after_restart(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Config) ->
  375:     [Node1 | _] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config),
  376:     {success, [A]} = ?start_activities([Node1]),
  377:     ?log("consistency_after_restart with ~p on ~p~n",
  378:          [ReplicaType, Nodes]),
  379:     TpcbConfig = tpcb_config(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes, [Node1]),
  380:     mnesia_tpcb:init(TpcbConfig),
  381:     A ! fun () -> mnesia_tpcb:run(TpcbConfig) end,
  382:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(3)),
  383:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
  384:     %% Start and wait for tables to be loaded on all nodes
  385:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(3)),
  386:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[account,branch,teller, history])), 
  387:     mnesia_tpcb:stop(),
  388:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  389:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  390: 
  391: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  392: 
  393: consistency_after_dump_tables_1_ram(suite) -> [];
  394: consistency_after_dump_tables_1_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  395:      consistency_after_dump_tables(ram_copies, 1, Config).
  396: 
  397: consistency_after_dump_tables_2_ram(suite) -> [];
  398: consistency_after_dump_tables_2_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  399:     consistency_after_dump_tables(ram_copies, 2, Config).
  400: 
  401: consistency_after_dump_tables(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Config) ->
  402:     [Node1 | _] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config),
  403:     {success, [A]} = ?start_activities([Node1]),
  404:     ?log("consistency_after_dump_tables with ~p on ~p~n",
  405:          [ReplicaType, Nodes]),
  406:     TpcbConfig = tpcb_config(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes, []),
  407:     mnesia_tpcb:init(TpcbConfig),
  408:     A ! fun() -> mnesia_tpcb:run(TpcbConfig) end,
  409:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(3)),
  410:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dump_tables,
  411:                         [[branch, teller, account, history]])),
  412:     mnesia_tpcb:stop(),
  413:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  414: 
  415:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  416:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  417:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[account, branch,
  418: 						   teller, history])),
  419:     mnesia_tpcb:stop(),
  420:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  421:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  422: 
  423: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  424: 
  425: consistency_after_add_replica_2_ram(suite) -> [];
  426: consistency_after_add_replica_2_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  427:     consistency_after_add_replica(ram_copies, 2, Config).
  428: 
  429: consistency_after_add_replica_2_disc(suite) -> [];
  430: consistency_after_add_replica_2_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  431:     consistency_after_add_replica(disc_copies, 2, Config).
  432: 
  433: consistency_after_add_replica_2_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  434: consistency_after_add_replica_2_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  435:     consistency_after_add_replica(disc_only_copies, 2, Config).
  436: 
  437: consistency_after_add_replica_3_ram(suite) -> [];
  438: consistency_after_add_replica_3_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  439:     consistency_after_add_replica(ram_copies, 3, Config).
  440: 
  441: consistency_after_add_replica_3_disc(suite) -> [];
  442: consistency_after_add_replica_3_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  443:     consistency_after_add_replica(disc_copies, 3, Config).
  444: 
  445: consistency_after_add_replica_3_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  446: consistency_after_add_replica_3_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  447:     consistency_after_add_replica(disc_only_copies, 3, Config).
  448: 
  449: consistency_after_add_replica(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Config) ->
  450:     Nodes0 = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config),
  451:     AddNode = lists:last(Nodes0),
  452:     Nodes = Nodes0 -- [AddNode],
  453:     Node1 = hd(Nodes),
  454:     {success, [A]} = ?start_activities([Node1]),
  455:     ?log("consistency_after_add_replica with ~p on ~p~n",
  456:          [ReplicaType, Nodes0]),
  457:     TpcbConfig = tpcb_config(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes, []),
  458:     mnesia_tpcb:init(TpcbConfig),
  459:     A ! fun () -> mnesia_tpcb:run(TpcbConfig) end,
  460:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(2)),
  461:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(account, AddNode, ReplicaType)),
  462:     mnesia_tpcb:stop(),
  463:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  464:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes0, []).
  465:

  492: consistency_after_del_replica(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Config) ->
  493:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config),
  494:     Node1 = hd(Nodes),
  495:     Node2 = lists:last(Nodes),
  496:     {success, [A]} = ?start_activities([Node1]),
  497:     ?log("consistency_after_del_replica with ~p on ~p~n",
  498:          [ReplicaType, Nodes]),
  499:     TpcbConfig = tpcb_config(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes, []),
  500:     mnesia_tpcb:init(TpcbConfig),
  501:     A ! fun () -> mnesia_tpcb:run(TpcbConfig) end,
  502:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(3)),
  503:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(account, Node2)),
  504:     mnesia_tpcb:stop(),
  505:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  506:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).

  533: 
  534: consistency_after_move_replica(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Config) ->
  535:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(10)}]),
  536:     Node1 = hd(Nodes),
  537:     Node2 = lists:last(Nodes),
  538:     {success, [A]} = ?start_activities([Node1]),
  539:     ?log("consistency_after_move_replica with ~p on ~p~n",
  540:          [ReplicaType, Nodes]),
  541:     TpcbConfig = tpcb_config(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes -- [Node2], []),
  542:     mnesia_tpcb:init(TpcbConfig),
  543:     A ! fun () -> mnesia_tpcb:run(TpcbConfig) end,
  544:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(3)),
  545:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(account, Node1, Node2)),    
  546:     ?log("First move completed from node ~p to ~p ~n", [Node1, Node2]),
  547:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(account, Node2, Node1)),
  548:     mnesia_tpcb:stop(),
  549:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  550:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  551:

  554: 
  555: consistency_after_transform_table_ram(suite) -> [];
  556: consistency_after_transform_table_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  557:     consistency_after_transform_table(ram_copies, Config).
  558: 
  559: consistency_after_transform_table_disc(suite) -> [];
  560: consistency_after_transform_table_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  561:     consistency_after_transform_table(disc_copies, Config).
  562: 
  563: consistency_after_transform_table_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  564: consistency_after_transform_table_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  565:     consistency_after_transform_table(disc_only_copies, Config).
  566: 
  567: consistency_after_transform_table(Type, Config) ->
  568:     Nodes = [N1, N2,_N3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  569: 
  570:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab1, [{index, [3]}, {Type, [N1]}])),
  571:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab2, [{index, [3]}, {Type, [N1,N2]}])),
  572:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab3, [{index, [3]}, {Type, Nodes}])),
  573:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(empty, [{index, [3]},{Type, Nodes}])),
  574:     
  575:     Tabs = lists:sort([tab1, tab2, tab3, empty]),
  576:     
  577:     [[mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, N, N}) || N <- lists:seq(1,10)] || 
  578: 	Tab <- Tabs -- [empty, tab4]],
  579:     mnesia:dump_log(),
  580:     
  581:     Ok = lists:duplicate(4, {atomic, ok}),
  582:     ?match(Ok, [mnesia:transform_table(Tab, fun({T, N, N}) ->  {T, N, N, ok} end,
  583: 	[k,a,n]) || Tab <- Tabs]),
  584:     [?match([k,a,n], mnesia:table_info(Tab, attributes)) || Tab <- Tabs],
  585: 
  586:     Filter = fun(Tab) -> mnesia:foldl(fun(A, Acc) when tuple_size(A) == 3 -> [A|Acc];
  587: 					 (A, Acc) when tuple_size(A) == 4 -> Acc
  588: 				      end, [], Tab)
  589: 	     end,    
  590: 	
  591:     ?match([[],[],[],[]], [element(2,mnesia:transaction(Filter, [Tab])) || Tab <- Tabs]),
  592:     
  593:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  594:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, Tabs),
  595:     
  596:     ?match([Tabs, Tabs, Tabs], 
  597: 	[lists:sort(rpc:call(Node, mnesia,system_info, [tables]) -- [schema]) || Node <- Nodes]),
  598:     
  599:     ?match([[],[],[],[]], [element(2,mnesia:transaction(Filter, [Tab])) || Tab <- Tabs]),
  600:     [?match([k,a,n], mnesia:table_info(Tab, attributes)) || Tab <- Tabs],
  601: 
  602:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  603: 
  604: 
  605: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  606: consistency_after_change_table_copy_type(doc) ->
  607:     ["Check that the database is consistent after change of copy type.",
  608:      " While applications are updating the involved tables. "].
  609:

  612: consistency_after_fallback_2_ram(suite) -> [];
  613: consistency_after_fallback_2_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  614:     consistency_after_fallback(ram_copies, 2, Config).
  615: 
  616: consistency_after_fallback_2_disc(suite) -> [];
  617: consistency_after_fallback_2_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  618:     consistency_after_fallback(disc_copies, 2, Config).
  619: 
  620: consistency_after_fallback_2_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  621: consistency_after_fallback_2_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  622:     consistency_after_fallback(disc_only_copies, 2, Config).
  623: 
  624: consistency_after_fallback_3_ram(suite) -> [];
  625: consistency_after_fallback_3_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  626:     consistency_after_fallback(ram_copies, 3, Config).
  627: 
  628: consistency_after_fallback_3_disc(suite) -> [];
  629: consistency_after_fallback_3_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  630:     consistency_after_fallback(disc_copies, 3, Config).
  631: 
  632: consistency_after_fallback_3_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  633: consistency_after_fallback_3_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  634:     consistency_after_fallback(disc_only_copies, 3, Config).
  635: 
  636: consistency_after_fallback(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Config) ->
  637:     put(mnesia_test_verbose, true),
  638:     %%?verbose("Starting consistency_after_fallback2 at ~p~n", [self()]),
  639:     Delay = 3,
  640:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(10)} | Config]),
  641:     Node1 = hd(Nodes),
  642:     %%?verbose("Mnesia info: ~p~n", [mnesia:info()]),
  643: 
  644:     {success, [A]} = ?start_activities([Node1]),
  645:     ?log("consistency_after_fallback with ~p on ~p~n",
  646:          [ReplicaType, Nodes]),
  647:     TpcbConfig = tpcb_config(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes, []),
  648:     mnesia_tpcb:init(TpcbConfig),
  649:     A ! fun () -> mnesia_tpcb:run(TpcbConfig) end,
  650:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(Delay)),
  651:     
  652:     %% Make a backup
  653:     ?verbose("Doing backup~n", []),
  654:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(consistency_after_fallback2)),
  655:     
  656:     %% Install the backup as a fallback
  657:     ?verbose("Doing fallback~n", []),
  658:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(consistency_after_fallback2)),
  659:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(Delay)),
  660: 
  661:     %% Stop tpcb
  662:     ?verbose("Stopping TPC-B~n", []),
  663:     mnesia_tpcb:stop(),    
  664:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  665:     
  666:     %% Stop and then start mnesia and check table consistency
  667:     ?verbose("Kill Mnesia~n", []),
  668:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  669:     ?verbose("Start Mnesia~n", []),
  670:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[account,branch,teller,history]),
  671:     ?verbose("Verify tabs~n", []),
  672:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  673:     if 
  674: 	ReplicaType == ram_copies ->
  675: 	    %% Test that change_table_copy work i.e. no account.dcd file exists.
  676: 	    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(account, node(), disc_copies));
  677: 	true -> 
  678: 	    ignore
  679:     end,
  680:     file:delete(consistency_after_fallback2),
  681:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  682: 
  683: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  684: 
  685: consistency_after_restore_clear_ram(suite) -> [];
  686: consistency_after_restore_clear_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  687:     consistency_after_restore(ram_copies, clear_tables, Config).
  688: 
  689: consistency_after_restore_clear_disc(suite) -> [];
  690: consistency_after_restore_clear_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  691:     consistency_after_restore(disc_copies, clear_tables, Config).
  692: 
  693: consistency_after_restore_clear_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  694: consistency_after_restore_clear_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  695:     consistency_after_restore(disc_only_copies, clear_tables, Config).
  696: 
  697: consistency_after_restore_recreate_ram(suite) -> [];
  698: consistency_after_restore_recreate_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  699:     consistency_after_restore(ram_copies, recreate_tables, Config).
  700: 
  701: consistency_after_restore_recreate_disc(suite) -> [];
  702: consistency_after_restore_recreate_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  703:     consistency_after_restore(disc_copies, recreate_tables, Config).
  704: 
  705: consistency_after_restore_recreate_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  706: consistency_after_restore_recreate_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  707:     consistency_after_restore(disc_only_copies, recreate_tables, Config).
  708: 
  709: consistency_after_restore(ReplicaType, Op, Config) ->
  710:     Delay = 1,
  711:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(10)} | Config]),
  712:     [Node1, Node2, _Node3] = Nodes,
  713:     File = "cons_backup_restore",
  714:     
  715:     ?log("consistency_after_restore with ~p on ~p~n",
  716:          [ReplicaType, Nodes]),
  717:     Tabs = [carA, carB, carC, carD],
  718:     
  719:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(carA, [{ReplicaType, Nodes}])),
  720:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(carB, [{ReplicaType, Nodes -- [Node1]}])),
  721:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(carC, [{ReplicaType, Nodes -- [Node2]}])),
  722:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(carD, [{ReplicaType, [Node2]}])),
  723: 
  724:     NList = lists:seq(0, 20),
  725:     [lists:foreach(fun(E) -> ok = mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, E, 1}) end, NList) ||
  726: 	Tab <- Tabs],
  727:     
  728:     {ok, Name, _} = mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, [schema | Tabs]}, 
  729: 						{ram_overrides_dump, true}]),
  730:     ?verbose("Doing backup~n", []),
  731:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(Name, File)),
  732:     ?match(ok, mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(Name)),
  733:     
  734:     [lists:foreach(fun(E) -> ok = mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, E, 2}) end, NList) ||
  735: 	Tab <- Tabs],
  736:     
  737:     Pids1 = [{'EXIT', spawn_link(?MODULE, change_tab, [self(), carA, Op]), carA} || _ <- lists:seq(1, 5)],
  738:     Pids2 = [{'EXIT', spawn_link(?MODULE, change_tab, [self(), carB, Op]), carB} || _ <- lists:seq(1, 5)],
  739:     Pids3 = [{'EXIT', spawn_link(?MODULE, change_tab, [self(), carC, Op]), carC} || _ <- lists:seq(1, 5)],
  740:     Pids4 = [{'EXIT', spawn_link(?MODULE, change_tab, [self(), carD, Op]), carD} || _ <- lists:seq(1, 5)],
  741:     
  742:     AllPids = Pids1 ++ Pids2 ++ Pids3 ++ Pids4,
  743:     
  744:     Restore = fun(F, Args) ->
  745: 		      case mnesia:restore(F, Args) of
  746: 			  {atomic, List} -> lists:sort(List);
  747: 			  Else -> Else
  748: 		      end
  749: 	      end,
  750: 
  751:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(Delay)),  %% Let changers grab locks
  752:     ?verbose("Doing restore~n", []),
  753:     ?match(Tabs, Restore(File, [{default_op, Op}])),
  754: 
  755:     Collect = fun(Msg, Acc) ->
  756: 		      receive Msg -> Acc
  757: 		      after 10000 -> [Msg|Acc]
  758: 		      end
  759: 	      end,
  760: 
  761:     Failed1 = lists:foldl(Collect, [], AllPids),
  762:     Failed  = lists:foldl(Collect, [], Failed1),
  763: 
  764:     case Failed of
  765: 	[] -> ok;
  766: 	_  ->
  767: 	    ?match([], Failed),
  768: 	    io:format("TIME: ~p sec~n", [erlang:system_time(seconds) band 16#FF]),
  769: 	    Dbg = fun({_, Pid, Tab}) ->
  770: 			  io:format("Tab ~p: ~p~n",[Tab, process_info(Pid, current_stacktrace)]),
  771: 			  [io:format(" ~p~n", [Rec]) || Rec <- mnesia:dirty_match_object({Tab, '_', '_'})]
  772: 		  end,
  773: 	    [Dbg(Msg) || Msg <- Failed],
  774: 	    io:format(" Held: ~p~n", [mnesia_locker:get_held_locks()]),
  775: 	    io:format("Queue: ~p~n", [mnesia_locker:get_lock_queue()])
  776:     end,
  777: 
  778:     case ?match(ok, restore_verify_tabs(Tabs)) of
  779: 	{success, ok} ->
  780: 	    file:delete(File);
  781: 	_ ->
  782: 	    {T, M, S} = time(),
  783: 	    File2 = ?flat_format("consistency_error~w~w~w.BUP", [T, M, S]),
  784: 	    file:rename(File, File2)
  785:     end,
  786:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  787: 
  788: change_tab(Father, Tab, Test) ->
  789:     Key = rand:uniform(20),
  790:     Update = fun() ->
  791: 		     Time = erlang:system_time(seconds) band 16#FF,
  792: 		     case put(time, Time) of
  793: 			 Time -> ok;
  794: 			 _ -> io:format("~p ~p ~p sec~n", [self(), Tab, Time])
  795: 		     end,
  796: 		     case mnesia:read({Tab, Key}) of
  797: 			 [{Tab, Key, 1}] ->  quit;
  798: 			 [{Tab, Key, _N}] -> mnesia:write({Tab, Key, 3})
  799: 		     end
  800: 	     end,
  801:     case mnesia:transaction(Update) of
  802: 	{atomic, quit} ->
  803: 	    exit(Tab);
  804: 	{aborted, {no_exists, Tab}} when Test == recreate_tables -> %% I'll allow this
  805: 	    change_tab(Father, Tab, Test);
  806: 	{atomic, ok} ->
  807: 	    change_tab(Father, Tab, Test)
  808:     end.
  809: 
  810: restore_verify_tabs([Tab | R]) ->
  811:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  812: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:foldl(fun({_, _, 1}, ok) -> 
  813: 							    ok;
  814: 						       (Else, Acc) ->
  815: 							    [Else|Acc]
  816: 						    end, ok, Tab) 
  817: 			      end)),
  818:     restore_verify_tabs(R);
  819: restore_verify_tabs([]) ->
  820:     ok.
  821: 
  822: 
  823: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  824:

  852: 
  853: updates_during_checkpoint_activation_3_disc(suite) -> [];
  854: updates_during_checkpoint_activation_3_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  855:     updates_during_checkpoint_activation(disc_copies, 3, Config).
  856: 
  857: updates_during_checkpoint_activation_3_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  858: updates_during_checkpoint_activation_3_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  859:     updates_during_checkpoint_activation(disc_only_copies, 3, Config).
  860: 
  861: updates_during_checkpoint_activation(ReplicaType,NodeConfig,Config) ->
  862:     %%?verbose("updates_during_checkpoint_activation2 at ~p~n", [self()]),
  863:     Delay = 2,
  864:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config),
  865:     Node1 = hd(Nodes),
  866:     %%?verbose("Mnesia info: ~p~n", [mnesia:info()]),
  867: 
  868:     {success, [A]} = ?start_activities([Node1]),
  869:     ?log("consistency_after_fallback with ~p on ~p~n",
  870:          [ReplicaType, Nodes]),
  871:     TpcbConfig = tpcb_config_dist(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes, Config),
  872:     %%TpcbConfig = tpcb_config(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes),
  873:     mnesia_tpcb:init(TpcbConfig),
  874:     A ! fun () -> mnesia_tpcb:run(TpcbConfig) end,
  875:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(Delay)),
  876: 
  877:     {ok, CPName, _NodeList} =
  878:         mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, mnesia:system_info(tables)},
  879: 				    {ram_overrides_dump, true}]),
  880:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(Delay)),
  881: 
  882:     %% Stop tpcb
  883:     ?verbose("Stopping TPC-B~n", []),
  884:     mnesia_tpcb:stop(),
  885:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  886:     
  887:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName, 
  888: 					updates_during_checkpoint_activation2)),
  889:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(Delay)),
  890: 
  891:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(updates_during_checkpoint_activation2)),
  892: 
  893:     %% Stop and then start mnesia and check table consistency
  894:     %%?verbose("Restarting Mnesia~n", []),
  895:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  896:     file:delete(updates_during_checkpoint_activation2),
  897:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[account,branch,teller, history]),
  898: 
  899:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  900:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  901: 
  902: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  903: 
  904: updates_during_checkpoint_iteration_2_ram(suite) -> [];
  905: updates_during_checkpoint_iteration_2_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  906:     updates_during_checkpoint_iteration(ram_copies, 2, Config).
  907: 
  908: updates_during_checkpoint_iteration_2_disc(suite) -> [];
  909: updates_during_checkpoint_iteration_2_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  910:     updates_during_checkpoint_iteration(disc_copies, 2, Config).
  911: 
  912: updates_during_checkpoint_iteration_2_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  913: updates_during_checkpoint_iteration_2_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  914:     updates_during_checkpoint_iteration(disc_only_copies, 2, Config).
  915: 
  916: updates_during_checkpoint_iteration(ReplicaType,NodeConfig,Config) ->
  917:    %?verbose("updates_during_checkpoint_iteration2 at ~p~n", [self()]),
  918:     Delay = 2,
  919:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config),
  920:     Node1 = hd(Nodes),
  921:    %?verbose("Mnesia info: ~p~n", [mnesia:info()]),
  922:     File = updates_during_checkpoint_iteration2,
  923:     {success, [A]} = ?start_activities([Node1]),
  924:     ?log("updates_during_checkpoint_iteration with ~p on ~p~n",
  925:          [ReplicaType, Nodes]),
  926:     TpcbConfig = tpcb_config_dist(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes, Config),
  927:     %%TpcbConfig = tpcb_config(ReplicaType, NodeConfig, Nodes),
  928:     TpcbConfigRec = list2rec(TpcbConfig, 
  929:                                          record_info(fields,tab_config),
  930:                                          #tab_config{}),
  931:     mnesia_tpcb:init(TpcbConfig),
  932:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  933: 
  934:     {ok, CPName, _NodeList} =
  935:         mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, mnesia:system_info(tables)},
  936:                                     {ram_overrides_dump,true}]),  
  937:     A ! fun () -> mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName, File) end,
  938: 
  939:     do_changes_during_backup(TpcbConfigRec),
  940: 
  941:     ?match_receive({A,ok}),
  942: 
  943:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(Delay)), 
  944:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(File)),
  945:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(Delay)),
  946: 
  947:     ?match({error,{"Bad balance",_,_}}, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  948:  
  949:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  950:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[account,branch,teller, history]),
  951: 
  952:     ?match(ok, mnesia_tpcb:verify_tabs()),
  953: 
  954:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  955:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  956: 
  957: do_changes_during_backup(TpcbConfig) ->
  958:     loop_branches(TpcbConfig#tab_config.n_branches,
  959:                   TpcbConfig#tab_config.n_accounts_per_branch).
  960: 
  961: loop_branches(N_br,N_acc) when N_br >= 1 ->
  962:    loop_accounts(N_br,N_acc),
  963:    loop_branches(N_br-1,N_acc);
  964: loop_branches(_,_) -> done.
  965: 
  966: loop_accounts(N_br, N_acc) when N_acc >= 1 ->
  967:     A = #account{id=N_acc, branch_id=N_br, balance = 4711},
  968:     ok = mnesia:dirty_write(A),
  969:     loop_accounts(N_br, N_acc-1);
  970: 
  971: loop_accounts(_,_) -> done.
  972: 
  973: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  974: 
  975: load_table_with_activated_checkpoint_ram(suite) -> [];
  976: load_table_with_activated_checkpoint_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  977:     load_table_with_activated_checkpoint(ram_copies, Config).
  978: 
  979: load_table_with_activated_checkpoint_disc(suite) -> [];
  980: load_table_with_activated_checkpoint_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  981:     load_table_with_activated_checkpoint(disc_copies, Config).
  982: 
  983: load_table_with_activated_checkpoint_disc_only(suite) -> [];
  984: load_table_with_activated_checkpoint_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  985:     load_table_with_activated_checkpoint(disc_only_copies, Config).
  986: 
  987: load_table_with_activated_checkpoint(Type, Config) ->
  988:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  989:     Node1 = hd(Nodes),
  990:     Tab = load_test,
  991:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
  992:            {Type, Nodes}],            %%  ??? important that RAM  ???
  993:     
  994:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
  995:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 4711})),
  996:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 42})),
  997:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, 256})),
  998:     
  999:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), 
 1000:     
 1001:     {ok, CPName, _NodeList} =
 1002:         mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, mnesia:system_info(tables)},
 1003:                                     {ram_overrides_dump,true}]),
 1004:     
 1005:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1]),    
 1006:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1],[Tab]),      
 1007:     %%--- check, whether the checkpiont is attached to both replicas
 1008:     {success, [A,B]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),
 1009:     
 1010:     A ! fun () ->
 1011: 		mnesia:table_info(Tab,checkpoints)
 1012: 	end,
 1013:     ?match_receive({A,[CPName]}),
 1014:     
 1015:     B ! fun () ->
 1016: 		mnesia:table_info(Tab,checkpoints)
 1017: 	end,
 1018:     ?match_receive({B,[CPName]}),    
 1019:     
 1020:     %%--- check, whether both retainers are consistent    
 1021:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 815})),       
 1022:     A ! fun () ->
 1023: 		mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName, load_table_a)
 1024: 	end,
 1025:     ?match_receive({A,ok}),
 1026:     B ! fun () ->
 1027: 		mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName, load_table_b)
 1028: 	end,
 1029:     ?match_receive({B,ok}),
 1030:     
 1031:     Mod = mnesia_backup, %% Assume local files
 1032:     List_a =  view(load_table_a, Mod),
 1033:     List_b =  view(load_table_b, Mod),
 1034:     
 1035:     ?match(List_a, List_b),
 1036:     
 1037:     ?match(ok,file:delete(load_table_a)),
 1038:     ?match(ok,file:delete(load_table_b)),
 1039:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1040: 
 1041: view(Source, Mod) ->
 1042:     View = fun(Item, Acc) ->
 1043:                    ?verbose("tab - item : ~p ~n",[Item]),
 1044: 		   case Item of
 1045: 		       {schema, Tab, Cs} ->  %% Remove cookie information
 1046: 			   NewCs = lists:keyreplace(cookie, 1, Cs,
 1047: 						    {cookie, skip_cookie}),
 1048: 			   Item2 = {schema, Tab, NewCs},
 1049: 			   {[Item], [Item2|Acc]};
 1050: 		       _ ->   
 1051: 			   {[Item], [Item|Acc]}
 1052: 		   end
 1053:            end,
 1054:     {ok,TabList} =  
 1055: 	mnesia:traverse_backup(Source, Mod, dummy, read_only, View, []),
 1056:     lists:sort(TabList).
 1057: 
 1058: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1059: 
 1060: add_table_copy_to_table_checkpoint_ram(suite) -> [];
 1061: add_table_copy_to_table_checkpoint_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1062:     add_table_copy_to_table_with_activated_checkpoint(ram_copies, Config).
 1063: 
 1064: add_table_copy_to_table_checkpoint_disc(suite) -> [];
 1065: add_table_copy_to_table_checkpoint_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1066:     add_table_copy_to_table_with_activated_checkpoint(disc_copies, Config).
 1067: 
 1068: add_table_copy_to_table_checkpoint_disc_only(suite) -> [];
 1069: add_table_copy_to_table_checkpoint_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1070:     add_table_copy_to_table_with_activated_checkpoint(disc_only_copies, Config).
 1071: 
 1072: add_table_copy_to_table_with_activated_checkpoint(Type,Config) -> 
 1073:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1074: 						%?verbose("NODES = ~p ~n",[Nodes]),
 1075:     [Node1,Node2] = Nodes,
 1076: 
 1077:     Tab = add_test,
 1078:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1079:            {Type, [Node1]}],            %%  ??? important that RAM  ???
 1080: 
 1081:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1082:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 4711})),
 1083:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 42})),
 1084:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, 256})),
 1085: 
 1086:     {ok, CPName, _NodeList} =
 1087:         mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, mnesia:system_info(tables)},
 1088:                                     {ram_overrides_dump,true}]),
 1089: 
 1090:     ?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab,Node2,ram_copies)),
 1091: 
 1092:     %%--- check, whether the checkpiont is attached to both replicas
 1093:     {success, [A,B]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),
 1094: 
 1095:     A ! fun () ->
 1096: 		mnesia:table_info(Tab,checkpoints)
 1097: 	end,
 1098:     ?match_receive({A,[CPName]}),
 1099: 
 1100:     B ! fun () ->
 1101: 		mnesia:table_info(Tab,checkpoints)
 1102: 	end,
 1103:     ?match_receive({B,[CPName]}),
 1104: 
 1105:     %%--- check, whether both retainers are consistent
 1106: 
 1107:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 815})),
 1108:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 815})),
 1109: 
 1110:     A ! fun () ->
 1111: 		mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName, add_table_a)
 1112: 	end,
 1113:     ?match_receive({A,ok}),
 1114:     B ! fun () ->
 1115: 		mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName, add_table_b)
 1116: 	end,
 1117:     ?match_receive({B,ok}),
 1118: 
 1119:     Mod = mnesia_backup, %% Assume local files
 1120: 
 1121:     List_a = view(add_table_a, Mod),
 1122:     List_b = view(add_table_b, Mod),
 1123: 
 1124:     ?match(List_a, List_b),
 1125: 
 1126:     ?match(ok,file:delete(add_table_a)),
 1127:     ?match(ok, file:delete(add_table_b)),
 1128:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1129:

 1133: 
 1134: inst_fallback_process_dies(suite) -> 
 1135:     [];
 1136: inst_fallback_process_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1137:     ?is_debug_compiled,
 1138:     
 1139:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
 1140:     {success, [A,_B,_C]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),
 1141:     
 1142:     TestPid = self(),
 1143:     DebugId = {mnesia_bup, fallback_receiver_loop, pre_swap},
 1144:     DebugFun =
 1145:         fun(PrevContext, _EvalContext) ->
 1146:                 ?verbose("fallback_receiver_loop -  pre_swap pid ~p  #~p~n",
 1147:                      [self(),PrevContext]),
 1148:                 TestPid ! {self(),fallback_preswap},
 1149: 		case receive_messages([fallback_continue]) of
 1150: 		    [{TestPid,fallback_continue}] ->
 1151: 			?deactivate_debug_fun(DebugId),
 1152: 			PrevContext+1
 1153: 		end
 1154:         end,
 1155:     ?activate_debug_fun(DebugId, DebugFun, 1),
 1156:         
 1157:     Tab = install_table,
 1158:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]}, {disc_copies, Nodes}], 
 1159:     
 1160:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1161:     
 1162:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 4711})),
 1163:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 42})),
 1164:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, 256})),
 1165:     
 1166:     {ok, CPName, _NodeList} =
 1167:         mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, mnesia:system_info(tables)},
 1168:                                     {ram_overrides_dump,true}]),
 1169:     
 1170:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName, install_backup)),
 1171:     
 1172:     A ! fun() -> mnesia:install_fallback(install_backup) end,    
 1173:     [{AnsPid,fallback_preswap}] = receive_messages([fallback_preswap]),
 1174:     exit(A, kill),
 1175:     AnsPid ! {self(), fallback_continue},
 1176:     ?match_receive({'EXIT', A, killed}), 
 1177:     timer:sleep(2000),  %% Wait till fallback is installed everywhere
 1178: 
 1179:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),    
 1180:     ?verbose("~n---->Mnesia is stopped everywhere<-----~n", []),
 1181:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[Tab])),
 1182:     
 1183:     check_data(Nodes, Tab),
 1184:     ?match(ok, file:delete(install_backup)),
 1185:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1186: 
 1187: check_data([N1 | R], Tab) ->
 1188:     ?match([{Tab, 1, 4711}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1189:     ?match([{Tab, 2, 42}],   rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 2}])),
 1190:     ?match([{Tab, 3, 256}],  rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 3}])),
 1191:     check_data(R, Tab);
 1192: check_data([], _Tab) -> 
 1193:     ok.
 1194: 
 1195: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1196: 
 1197: fatal_when_inconsistency(suite) -> 
 1198:     [];
 1199: fatal_when_inconsistency(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1200:     ?is_debug_compiled,
 1201:     
 1202:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = 
 1203: 	?acquire_nodes(3, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
 1204:     {success, [A,_B,_C]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),
 1205:     
 1206:     TestPid = self(),
 1207:     DebugId = {mnesia_bup, fallback_receiver_loop, pre_swap},
 1208:     DebugFun =
 1209:         fun(PrevContext, _EvalContext) ->
 1210:                 ?verbose("fallback_receiver_loop -  pre_swap pid ~p  #~p~n",
 1211:                      [self(),PrevContext]),
 1212:                 TestPid ! {self(),fallback_preswap},
 1213: 		case receive_messages([fallback_continue])  of
 1214: 		    [{TestPid,fallback_continue}] ->
 1215: 			?deactivate_debug_fun(DebugId),
 1216: 			PrevContext+1
 1217: 		end
 1218:         end,
 1219:     ?activate_debug_fun(DebugId, DebugFun, 1),
 1220:         
 1221:     Tab = install_table,
 1222:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]}, {disc_copies, Nodes}], 
 1223:     
 1224:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1225:     
 1226:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 4711})),
 1227:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 42})),
 1228:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, 256})),
 1229:     
 1230:     {ok, CPName, _NodeList} =
 1231:         mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, mnesia:system_info(tables)},
 1232:                                     {ram_overrides_dump,true}]),
 1233:     
 1234:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName, install_backup)),
 1235:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 42424242})),
 1236:     
 1237:     A ! fun() ->
 1238:                 mnesia:install_fallback(install_backup)
 1239:         end,    
 1240: 
 1241:     [{AnsPid,fallback_preswap}] = receive_messages([fallback_preswap]),
 1242:     exit(AnsPid, kill),  %% Kill install-fallback on local node will 
 1243:     AnsPid ! {self(), fallback_continue},
 1244:     ?deactivate_debug_fun(DebugId),
 1245:         
 1246:     ?match_receive({A,{error,{"Cannot install fallback",
 1247: 			      {'EXIT',AnsPid,killed}}}}),
 1248:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
 1249:     ?verbose("EXPECTING FATAL from 2 nodes WITH CORE DUMP~n", []),
 1250:     
 1251:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1],[])),
 1252:     is_running(Node1, yes),
 1253:     ?match([{Node2, mnesia, _}], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2],[])),
 1254:     is_running(Node2, no),
 1255:     ?match([{Node3, mnesia, _}], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node3],[])),
 1256:     is_running(Node3, no),
 1257:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
 1258:     
 1259:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(install_backup)),    
 1260:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[Tab]),
 1261:     
 1262:     check_data(Nodes, Tab),
 1263:     
 1264:     ?match(ok,file:delete(install_backup)),
 1265:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1266: 
 1267: is_running(Node, Shouldbe) ->
 1268:     timer:sleep(1000),
 1269:     Running = rpc:call(Node, mnesia, system_info, [is_running]),
 1270:     case Running of
 1271: 	Shouldbe -> ok;
 1272: 	_  -> is_running(Node, Shouldbe)
 1273:     end.
 1274: 
 1275: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1276: 
 1277: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1278: 
 1279: after_delete(doc) ->
 1280:     ["interrupt the uninstall after deletion of ",
 1281:      "fallback files - there shall be no fallback"];
 1282: after_delete(suite) -> [];
 1283: after_delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1284:         do_uninstall(Config, post_delete).
 1285: 
 1286: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1287: 
 1288: do_uninstall(Config,DebugPoint) ->
 1289:     ?is_debug_compiled,
 1290:     
 1291:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1292:     %%?verbose("NODES = ~p ~n",[Nodes]),
 1293:     
 1294:     {success, [P1,P2,P3]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),
 1295:     
 1296:     NP1 = node(P1),
 1297:     NP2 = node(P2),
 1298:     
 1299:     {A,B,C} = case node() of
 1300: 		  NP1 ->
 1301: 		      %%?verbose("first case ~n"),
 1302: 		      {P3,P2,P1};
 1303: 		  NP2 ->
 1304: 		      %%?verbose("second case ~n"),
 1305: 		      {P3, P1, P2};
 1306: 		  _  ->
 1307: 		      { P1, P2, P3}
 1308: 	      end,
 1309:     
 1310:     Node1 = node(A),
 1311:     Node2 = node(B),
 1312:     Node3 = node(C),
 1313:     
 1314:     ?verbose(" A   pid:~p  node:~p ~n",[A,Node1]),
 1315:     ?verbose(" B   pid:~p  node:~p ~n",[B,Node2]),
 1316:     ?verbose(" C   pid:~p  node:~p ~n",[C,Node3]),
 1317:     
 1318:     
 1319:     TestPid = self(),
 1320:     %%?verbose("TestPid : ~p~n",[TestPid]),
 1321:     DebugId = {mnesia_bup, uninstall_fallback2, DebugPoint},
 1322:     DebugFun = fun(PrevContext, _EvalContext) ->
 1323: 		       ?verbose("uninstall_fallback pid ~p  #~p~n"
 1324: 				,[self(),PrevContext]),
 1325: 		       TestPid ! {self(),uninstall_predelete},
 1326: 		       case receive_messages([uninstall_continue]) of
 1327: 			   [{TestPid,uninstall_continue}] ->
 1328: 			       ?deactivate_debug_fun(DebugId),
 1329: 			       %%?verbose("uninstall_fallback continues~n"),
 1330: 			       PrevContext+1
 1331: 		       end
 1332: 	       end,
 1333:     ?remote_activate_debug_fun(Node1,DebugId, DebugFun, 1),
 1334:     
 1335:     Tab = install_table,
 1336:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1337:            {ram_copies, Nodes}],     %% necessary to test different types ???  
 1338:     
 1339:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1340:     
 1341:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 4711})),
 1342:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 42})),
 1343:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, 256})),
 1344:     
 1345:     {ok, CPName, _NodeList} =
 1346:         mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, mnesia:system_info(tables)},
 1347:                                     {ram_overrides_dump,true}]),
 1348:     
 1349:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName,install_backup)),
 1350:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), 
 1351:     
 1352:     A ! fun () ->
 1353: 		mnesia:install_fallback(install_backup)
 1354: 	end,
 1355:     ?match_receive({A,ok}),
 1356:     
 1357:     A ! fun () ->
 1358: 		mnesia:uninstall_fallback()
 1359: 	end,
 1360:     %%
 1361:     %%  catch the debug entry in mnesia and kill one Mnesia node
 1362:     %%
 1363:     
 1364:     
 1365:     [{AnsPid,uninstall_predelete}] = receive_messages([uninstall_predelete]),
 1366:     
 1367:     ?verbose("AnsPid : ~p~n",[AnsPid]),
 1368:     
 1369:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2]),
 1370:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), 
 1371:     
 1372:     AnsPid ! {self(),uninstall_continue},
 1373:     
 1374:     ?match_receive({A,ok}),
 1375:     
 1376:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes) ,
 1377:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[Tab]),
 1378:     
 1379:     A ! fun () ->
 1380: 		R1 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,1}),
 1381: 		R2 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,2}),
 1382: 		R3 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,3}),
 1383: 		{R1,R2,R3}
 1384: 	end,    
 1385:     ?match_receive({ A, {[],[],[]} }),
 1386:     
 1387:     B ! fun () ->
 1388: 		R1 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,1}),
 1389: 		R2 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,2}),
 1390: 		R3 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,3}),
 1391: 		{R1,R2,R3}
 1392: 	end,
 1393:     ?match_receive({ B, {[],[],[]} }),
 1394:     
 1395:     C ! fun () ->
 1396: 		R1 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,1}),
 1397: 		R2 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,2}),
 1398: 		R3 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,3}),
 1399: 		{R1,R2,R3}
 1400: 	end,
 1401:     ?match_receive({ C, {[],[],[]} }),
 1402:     
 1403:     ?match(ok,file:delete(install_backup)),
 1404:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1405: 
 1406: 
 1407: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1408: 
 1409: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1410: 
 1411: cause_switch_before(doc)  ->
 1412:       ["interrupt the backup before iterating the retainer"];
 1413: cause_switch_before(suite)  ->  [];
 1414: cause_switch_before(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1415:    do_something_during_backup(cause_switch,pre,Config).
 1416: 
 1417: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1418: 
 1419: cause_switch_after(doc)  ->
 1420:       ["interrupt the backup after iterating the retainer"];
 1421: cause_switch_after(suite)  ->  [];
 1422: cause_switch_after(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1423:    do_something_during_backup(cause_switch,post,Config).
 1424: 
 1425: 
 1426: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1427: 
 1428: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1429: 
 1430: cause_abort_before(doc) ->
 1431:       ["interrupt the backup before iterating the retainer"];
 1432: 
 1433: cause_abort_before(suite) ->  [];
 1434: cause_abort_before(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1435:    do_something_during_backup(cause_abort,pre,Config).
 1436: 
 1437: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1438: 
 1439: cause_abort_after(doc) ->
 1440:       ["interrupt the backup after iterating the retainer"];
 1441: 
 1442: cause_abort_after(suite) ->  [];
 1443: cause_abort_after(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1444:    do_something_during_backup(cause_abort,post,Config).
 1445: 
 1446: 
 1447: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1448: 
 1449: %%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1450: 
 1451: change_schema_before(doc) ->
 1452:       ["interrupt the backup before iterating the retainer"];
 1453: change_schema_before(suite) -> [];
 1454: change_schema_before(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1455:    do_something_during_backup(change_schema,pre,Config).
 1456: 
 1457: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1458: 
 1459: change_schema_after(doc) ->
 1460:       ["interrupt the backup after iterating the retainer"];
 1461: change_schema_after(suite) -> [];
 1462: change_schema_after(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1463:    do_something_during_backup(change_schema,post,Config).
 1464: 
 1465: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1466: 
 1467: do_something_during_backup(Action,DebugPoint,Config) ->
 1468:     ?is_debug_compiled,
 1469:     
 1470:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1471:     
 1472:     {success, [A,B,C]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),
 1473:     
 1474:     Node1 = node(A),
 1475:     Node2 = node(B),
 1476:     Node3 = node(C),
 1477:     
 1478:     TestPid = self(),
 1479:     %%?verbose("TestPid : ~p~n",[TestPid]),
 1480:     
 1481:     Tab = interrupt_table,
 1482:     Bak = interrupt_backup,
 1483:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1484:            {ram_copies, [Node2,Node3]}],  
 1485:     %% necessary to test different types ???  
 1486:     
 1487:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1488:     
 1489:     
 1490:     
 1491:     DebugId = {mnesia_log, tab_copier, DebugPoint},
 1492:     DebugFun = fun(PrevContext, EvalContext) ->
 1493: 		       ?verbose("interrupt backup  pid ~p  #~p ~n context ~p ~n"
 1494: 			    ,[self(),PrevContext,EvalContext]),
 1495: 		       TestPid ! {self(),interrupt_backup_pre},
 1496: 		       global:set_lock({{lock_for_backup, Tab}, self()},
 1497: 				       Nodes,
 1498: 				       infinity),
 1499: 		       		       
 1500: 		       %%?verbose("interrupt backup - continues ~n"),
 1501: 		       ?deactivate_debug_fun(DebugId),
 1502: 		       PrevContext+1
 1503: 	       end,
 1504:     ?remote_activate_debug_fun(Node1,DebugId, DebugFun, 1),
 1505:     
 1506:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 4711})),
 1507:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 42})),
 1508:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, 256})),
 1509:     
 1510:     {ok, CPName, _NodeList} =
 1511:         mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, mnesia:system_info(tables)},
 1512:                                     {ram_overrides_dump,true}]),
 1513:     
 1514:     A ! fun () ->
 1515: 		%%?verbose("node: ~p pid: ~p ~n",[node(),self()]),
 1516: 		mnesia:table_info(Tab,where_to_read)
 1517: 	end,
 1518: 
 1519:     ReadNode_a = receive { A, ReadNode_a_tmp } -> ReadNode_a_tmp end,
 1520:     ?verbose("ReadNode ~p ~n",[ReadNode_a]),
 1521:     
 1522:     global:set_lock({{lock_for_backup, Tab}, self()}, Nodes, infinity),
 1523:     
 1524:     A ! fun () ->    %% A shall perform the backup, so the test proc is
 1525: 		%% able to do further actions in between
 1526: 		mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CPName, Bak)
 1527: 	end,
 1528:     
 1529:     %% catch the debug function of mnesia, stop the backup process 
 1530:     %% kill the node ReadNode_a and continue the backup process
 1531:     %% As there is a second replica of the table, the backup shall continue
 1532: 
 1533:     case receive_messages([interrupt_backup_pre]) of
 1534: 	[{_AnsPid,interrupt_backup_pre}] -> ok
 1535:     end,
 1536:     
 1537:     case Action of
 1538:         cause_switch ->
 1539: 	    mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([ReadNode_a]),
 1540: 	    timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1));
 1541:         cause_abort ->
 1542: 	    mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2,Node3]),
 1543: 	    timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1));
 1544:         change_schema ->
 1545: 	    Tab2 = second_interrupt_table,
 1546: 	    Def2 = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1547: 		    {ram_copies, Nodes}],  
 1548: 	    
 1549: 	    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2))
 1550:     end,
 1551:     
 1552:     %%    AnsPid ! {self(),interrupt_backup_continue},
 1553:     global:del_lock({{lock_for_backup, Tab}, self()}, Nodes),
 1554:     
 1555:     case Action of
 1556:         cause_abort -> 
 1557: 	    
 1558:             %% answer of A when finishing the backup
 1559:             ?match_receive({A,{error, _}}), 
 1560: 	    
 1561:             ?match({error,{"Cannot install fallback",_}},
 1562:                    mnesia:install_fallback(Bak)); 
 1563:         _ ->      %% cause_switch, change_schema
 1564: 	    
 1565:             ?match_receive({A,ok}), %% answer of A when finishing the backup
 1566: 	    
 1567:             %% send a fun to that node where mnesia is still running
 1568:             WritePid = case ReadNode_a of
 1569: 			   Node2 -> C; %%   node(C) == Node3
 1570: 			   Node3 -> B
 1571:                        end,
 1572:             WritePid ! fun () ->
 1573: 			       ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 815})),
 1574: 			       ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 816})),
 1575: 			       ok
 1576:                        end,
 1577:             ?match_receive({ WritePid, ok }),  
 1578:             ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(Bak))
 1579:     end,        
 1580:     
 1581:     %% Stop and then start mnesia and check table consistency
 1582:     %%?verbose("Restarting Mnesia~n", []),
 1583:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
 1584:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[Tab]),
 1585:     
 1586:     case Action of
 1587:         cause_switch ->
 1588: 	    %% the backup should exist
 1589: 	    cross_check_tables([A,B,C],Tab,{[{Tab,1,4711}],
 1590: 					    [{Tab,2,42}],
 1591: 					    [{Tab,3,256}] }),
 1592: 	    ?match(ok,file:delete(Bak));
 1593:         cause_abort ->
 1594: 	    %% the backup should  NOT exist
 1595: 	    cross_check_tables([A,B,C],Tab,{[],[],[]}),
 1596: 	    %% file does not exist 
 1597: 	    ?match({error, _},file:delete(Bak)); 
 1598:         change_schema ->
 1599: 	    %% the backup should exist
 1600: 	    cross_check_tables([A,B,C],Tab,{[{Tab,1,4711}],
 1601: 					    [{Tab,2,42}],
 1602: 					    [{Tab,3,256}] }),
 1603: 	    ?match(ok,file:delete(Bak))
 1604:     end,
 1605:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1606: 
 1607: %% check the contents of the table
 1608: cross_check_tables([],_tab,_elements) -> ok;
 1609: cross_check_tables([Pid|Rest],Tab,{Val1,Val2,Val3}) ->
 1610:     Pid ! fun () ->
 1611:               R1 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,1}),
 1612:               R2 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,2}),
 1613:               R3 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,3}),
 1614:               {R1,R2,R3}
 1615:             end,
 1616:     ?match_receive({ Pid, {Val1, Val2, Val3 } }),
 1617:     cross_check_tables(Rest,Tab,{Val1,Val2,Val3} ).
